page.title: 16FARNBOROUGH COMMON
page.content: This is a very busy road which causes difficulty in crossing .There are a few old,detached and one group of terraced houses along the road.Also there are some two storey flats.There is a lot of woodland and a bridle path.Towards the end of the road is a fruit farm.Here you can pick your own fruit ,or buy it in the farm shop. The facilities along the road include a regular bus service ,a telephone box and a post box.Also there is a heating factory .At the end of the road is a zebra crossing.Opposite this is a small school,Farnborough Primary School.This is on the corner of two roads ,Farnborough Common and Starts Hill.
